column4: I running Dapper Drake (6.0.6) and need to include the command "sudo iwpriv ath0 authmode 2" on every reboot since it enables WEP on my wireless card.  How do I add the instruction?  Config file? Can I use a text editor?  I am new to Linux and would appreciate some help.
that's not a quirk, but adesign decision
ubotu, & czr - thanks to all of you for the kind assistance!   I didn't want to assume you'd be here after I try a reboot and wait till then to thank you.
